2) Type in a non-existent file name
3) Click finish

The same thing happens with the Preference export wizard if you type a bogus
file name (such "::").  An error is written to the log but there is no
indication to the user that anything happened with the export (good or bad).
renaming as Import is fixed and moving to RC2

adds support for export file validation
